summary: REQ-9 (prompt copy) appears implemented in ValentinePrompt.tsx with the exact heading text "Will you be my Valentine, Sunidhi?". The diff does not provide evidence that "Mahek" appears in any rendered UI text, though it does appear in project_state.json (which is not necessarily UI).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added meta documentation/state describing the app (project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt), which was not requested by REQ-9 (copy change only).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update the Valentine question copy and explicitly focuses on preserving interaction behavior; it does not request changes to project metadata/summary files.
